Revenue.definition: the total income produced by a given source [a property expected to yield a large annual ] 2
Revenue.origin: [a property expected to yield a large annual ]

1.definition: the total income produced by a given source [a property expected to yield a large annual ]

2.definition: the gross income returned by an investment

3.definition: the yield of sources of income (as taxes) that a political unit (as a nation or state) collects and receives into the treasury for public use

4.definition: a government department concerned with the collection of national revenue
